Huda Sultan ma ọ bụ Hoda Sultan aha ọmụmụ: Bahiga Abd El Aal (15 August 1925 - 5 June 2006) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agụ egwu

A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dika nne na ihe nkiri na telivishọn ndị Ijipt. Ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri a na-enye onyinye maka ọrụ ya, ọkachasị na egwu na ihe nkiri ojii na ọcha ebe ọ na-arụ ọrụ nke abụọ
Sultan rụrụ ọtụtụ narị ihe nkiri n'ime afọ irí ịse na isii ọ rụrụ ọrụ.
A mụrụ Huda Sultan na 15 Ọgọstụ 1925 n'ime ime obodo Ijipt nke Tanta n'ezinụlọ dị ala

Ọ bụ nwa nke atọ n'ime ụmụnne ise; otu n'ime nwanne ya nwoke bụ onye omenkà a ma ama bụ Mohamed Fawzi. A mụrụ ya dị ka Bahiga Abd El-Aal, mana o mechara nabata aha ọhụrụ ya, Huda Sultan, mgbe ọtụtụ aro sitere n'aka ndị na-emepụta ihe nkiri Egypt a ma ama na aha ọmụmụ ya dị ka nke ime obodo.
Sultan lụrụ di ugboro ise: di mbụ ya, Mohamed Naguib, bụ onye ọrụ gọọmentị Ijipt a ma ama nke na-ekwenyeghị na ọnọdụ nwunye ya ma gbaa ya alụkwaghịm n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ihe nkiri mbụ ya gasịrị

Di ya nke abụọ bụ onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri Egypt, di ya nke atọ bụ Fowad Al-Atrash (nwanne nwoke nke onye na-agụ egwu Farid al-Atrish), ọ gbara ya alụkwaghịm iji lụọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Farid Shawki. Ọ lụrụ onye nduzi Hassan Abdel Salam.
Sultan nwere otu nwa nwanyị ya na di mbụ ya, Mohamed Naguib, nke a na-akpọ Maha, na ụmụ nwanyị abụọ n'aka di ya nke abụọ Shawki, otu n'ime ha, Nahed, onye bụ onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri
Nwa nwa ya nwanyị bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Nahed El Sebai

N'afọ 1950, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri mbụ ya "Set El Hosn" (Egyptian Arabic: ست الحسن, "Nwanyị mara mma"); n'oge na-adịghị anya, ọ lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Ijipt Farid Shawki na di na nwunye ahụ guzobere otu na-aga nke ọma ma rụkọọ ọrụ ọnụ n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri. Ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ ya ndị a ma ama bụ ihe ; "El Fetewa" (Egyptian Arabic: الفتوة, "The Bully"), Ezz El-Dine Zulficarī "Emraʹa Fel Tareeq" (Arabic: إمرأة في 2013), "Nesaa Moharramat" (Ebyptian Arabic) na Salah Zulfikar, ːThalath Nry (Egypt: Zulfikara na Nzahanzar)
"Shaye' Fe Sadry" (Arabic, "Ihe dị  m") na Rushdy Abaza
Ọzọkwa "El Ekhtyar" nke Youssef Chahine (Egyptian Arabic: الإختيار, "The Choice") na Soad Hosny, na "El Wada'a Ya Banobart" (Egyptan Arabic: الوداع يا بونبارت, "Adieu Bonaparte").
N'afọ 2006, ọ nwụrụ, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asatọ na otu, mgbe ọ lụchara ọgụ ọrịa kansa akpa ume, na Dar Al Fouad na 6th Ọktoba, Egypt.
